specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.
specialRules.name: Ancient Commander
specialRules.label: Ancient Commander
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.

specialRules.hint: This unit counts as having Psychic(X), where X is the number of models in it. Only one model in the unit may cast or block spells each round.
specialRules.name: Psychic Council
specialRules.label: Psychic Council
specialRules.description: This unit counts as having Psychic(X), where X is the number of models in it. Only one model in the unit may cast or block spells each round.

specialRules.hint: When this model is activated it may teleport by up to 6” in any direction, ignoring all units and terrain.
specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.label: Teleport
specialRules.description: When this model is activated it may teleport by up to 6” in any direction, ignoring all units and terrain.

specialRules.hint: This model moves 12” when using Advance and 24” when using Rush/Charge.
specialRules.name: Very Fast
specialRules.label: Very Fast
specialRules.description: This model moves 12” when using Advance and 24” when using Rush/Charge.

spells.name: Hide
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Soul Seeker
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Creator
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to defense next time it takes hits.

spells.name: Destroyer
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 6 automatic hits.

spells.name: Blessing
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately charge by up to 6” and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: Curse
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 4 hits with AP(2) each.
